title: This activity teaches you to how to use user defined exceptions in any java program.

questionText.text:
Now your task is to extend the program which is discussed as part of the video.
ListEmptyException:This exception has to be thrown when there is no element to be removed from the list, Throw this exception and print message saying List is empty
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
